introduction: SYNOPSISUnder the ruling of the 9th king Seong-jong of Chosun Dynasty, Oeul-Udong of noble birth gets married off to Yi-dong. Due to the lack of attention from her husband, she, in disguise as a servant, approaches the silversmith, Lee. As result of this incident, she is thrown out of the family and meets a young warrior, Hong In-ro. Though she experiences true love and pleasure with him, he dies during the war. Oeul-Udong keeps up her love affairs neglecting the conventions of the time until she is sentenced to death to set an example by the government.故事男人的朝鲜9 yeosik eoeulwoodong时成宗工资是受戒jongchin taegangsu举动。始终eoeulwoodong感到失望jiahbi的定义没有赢得一个chunjeong eunjangyi回家的一天，获得最诺维萨德。一天，我遇到了她从年轻的无人值守香港乳头比赛日的追逐途中客厅，在痛苦和真正的爱情。Mothayeo很长一段时间，而且在红衣男子的喜悦是从战场上的战士不幸的是eoeulwoodong是感叹他的bakbok并会逐渐失去自我。最后被没完没了的事忽略了你的惯例，这种放纵的传言上升远远中信会议最终调整。作为baekgye代表性的一个eoeulwoodong将获得死刑。
